attributes.action: Offer the British people a referendum on continued membership of the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The last referendum on the EU in 1975 asked the public if they wanted to be part of the EEC - a trading agreement between Britain and other European countries. They were never asked if they wanted political integration

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Offer the British people a referendum on continued membership of the European Union."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11041.asp
